cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("OpenGLAppExample")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED OpenGLAppExample_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "OpenGLAppExample_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(OpenGLAppExample_jucer_FILE
  "${OpenGLAppExample_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

  JUCER_VERSION "4.3.1"
  PROJECT_FILE "${OpenGLAppExample_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "c3KrlE"
)

  PROJECT_NAME "OpenGLAppExample"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  PROJECT_TYPE "GUI Application"
